Package models

Class Billing

java.lang.Object
models.Billing
public class Billing extends Object
Represents a billing record for a patient's appointment. This class includes details such as the invoice ID, patient ID, doctor ID, appointment ID, total amount, and billing status.

    • Billing

      public Billing(String invoiceId, String patientId, String doctorId, String appointmentId, double totalAmount, String status)
      Constructs a Billing object with all the required attributes.
      Parameters:
      invoiceId - The unique identifier for the invoice.
      patientId - The unique identifier for the patient.
      doctorId - The unique identifier for the doctor.
      appointmentId - The unique identifier for the appointment.
      totalAmount - The total amount to be billed.
      status - The status of the billing (e.g., "Paid", "Pending").

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Converts the Billing object to a CSV-formatted string. The appointment ID is enclosed in quotes to prevent issues with large numeric IDs.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A CSV string representation of the Billing object.

    • fromCSV

      public static Billing fromCSV(String line)
      Creates a Billing object from a CSV string. This method parses a CSV line into the corresponding Billing attributes.
      Parameters:
      line - The CSV string representing a Billing record.
      Returns:
      A Billing object created from the provided CSV string.
